text: Ani tumhala masika palivisayi vicaratata, sanga ti ghaneradi avastha ahe. Masika palicya veli striyampasuna alaga raha ani joparyanta tya paka (svaccha-sud'dha) hota nahita tyancya javala ja'u naka, matra jevha tya paka hotila, tevha tyancya javala ja, jasi allahane tumhala anumati dili ahe. Nihsansaya, allaha maphi maganaryala ani svaccha-sud'dha (paka) rahanaryala pasanta karato
